txt.en: 'These old bones do not move like they used to.'
'[placeholder], listen!'
'I am tired, and this fight is not mine.'
'Go and defeat Mordrambor... maybe we can find out more about this new Master of his.'
'I tire of this.'
'Come, join with me, [placeholder].'
'Champion of Angmar? A lofty title.'
'Those who stand against Mordrambor, the Champion of Angmar and servant of the Great Eye, will surely fall.'
'Die? Nay, I think not.'
'Ah, the hag, thou hast come to die as well?'
'Thou hast revealed much.'
'Treacherous?'
'Treacherous tongues should not wag so freely.'
'Mistress! I...'
'This is not over!'
'We must hurry if we are to find your ring, [placeholder].'
Saija Died
'Quickly, kill it!'
Saija has promised to guide you in your search for Narchuil.
'Didst thou believe I would be so foolish as to let thee go unwatched to Forochel?'
'Thou wilt pay for thine insolence!'
Talk to Saija
'Dost thou still persist?'
Search for Narchuil
'I must give thee credit, [placeholder].'
Protect Saija
'I did not believe thou would live this long.'
Search for Narchuil
'Come, we must hurry if we are to retrieve the ring before Mordrambor.'
'Do not trust that this will continue.'
'Look! Mordrambor is nearer at hand than we thought.'
'Work is slow master... it will take time.'
'Soon I will tire of thee and thy quest will end.'
'Master? Who... no matter.'
'No, no, please!'
'All those who placed hope in thee will suffer until their bitter end.'
'It seems that the way has been blocked to hinder us.'
'Ahhhhhhhhh!'
'Come, we must find something that can thaw this.'
'Quickly, search for something that can aid us!'
'We must hurry if we are to find your ring.'
'You have done it!  Let us continue then.'
'This is tiring business. Wait one moment while I catch my breath.'
'Didst thou think that with the aid of this elderly hag thou would best me?'
'I will claim Narchuil as my own and deliver it to my new Master.'
'Thou will bow at my feet before thy death.'
Speak to Saija inside of Halla-kolo.
Search Halla-kolo for the ring Narchuil.
Search Halla-kolo for the ring Narchuil.
'Ah, I was wondering if thou would make it this far.'
'Thou hast quite a talent for avoiding death!'
'If thou dost insist on hindering my progress then I will deal with thee now.'
'If thou would but aid me thou would receive great rewards.'
'My new Master knows how to honour those who aid him.'
'Nay? Then thou will not leave this place!'
'Let us see how thee fare against the winds of the North!'
'Dost thou hear it? The winds carry fell voices.'
'Angmar has power over things more terrible than thy darkest nightmares!'
'What progress hast thou made?'
'If thou cannot do the work, I shall find someone who can.'
'We must hurry, quickly, this way!'
'Another hindrance....'
'He must be powerful indeed if he can freeze and thaw at his will.'
Instance:  The Path of Aearil
'Some new strength drives him....'
'Search the area for a way through.'
'My eyes are not what they used to be.'
